name: Harvest Hearts
description:
DATT2310: Game Design and Development II Vertical Slice Submission

Lab 02 Group 4

You are a farmer that owns a small farm and a plot of land. You must work hard to grow crops, raise animals and maintain the land. As you live your peaceful farm life, you meet many other characters and form relationships with them through meetings and events that happen within the game. As your bonds with different characters grow, you may even find love! Just make sure that it does not negatively affect your daily duties. Balance is key!

Instructions

  • Explore the map and pick up tools to aid your farming life
  • Plant and Harvest Crops using the appropriate tools
  • Advance day by pressing the 'G' key to grow crops
  • Have a chat with Gwen by pressing 'Spacebar'
